mapper.insert: insert into note (user_id_send, user_id_receive, note_is_read, note_send_time, note_content, type) value (#{userIdSend},#{userIdReceive},FALSE,now(),#{noteContent}, 'send'),(#{userIdSend},#{userIdReceive},FALSE,now(),#{noteContent}, 'receive');
mapper.select: select note_id as noteId, user_id_send as userIdSend, user_id_receive as userIdReceive, note_is_read as noteIsRead, note_send_time as noteSendTime, note_content as noteContent from note where user_id_send = #{userId} type = 'send';
